The Utility Library

Modules

 Command Line and Config File Interfacing
 

Detailed Description

The Utility Library

For detailed documentation of the utility classes look into their class reference documentation. All utility classes reside within namespace util:

  • util::Region provides methods for parsing array geometries.
  • util::CommandLineReader, util::ConfigFileReader, and util::Option provide methods for command line and configuration file parsing of arbitrary options.
  • util::UTDate and its heirs enable Date conversion between different formats.
  • util::StringFactory gives methods for formatting number strings.
  • util::Timer can calculate system time (i.e. performance tests).
